definition: to survey the scene from an elevated position
to gaze into the distance
full moon/to hope/to expect/to visit/to gaze (into the distance)/to look towards/towards
15th day of month (lunar calendar)/old variant of 望[wang4]

sentences.english: I am now at a very pleasant cottage window looking onto a beautiful hilly country, with a view of the sea.
sentences.chinese: 我正惬意地临窗而坐，眺望远山如黛，碧海连天。

sentences.english: The Loggia overlooks the cactus garden and outdoor fireplace.
sentences.chinese: 长廊眺望仙人掌花园和户外壁炉。

sentences.english: Jeremy's eyes widened as he looked down at the city lights.
sentences.chinese: 杰瑞米的眼睛睁得很大，眺望这个城市的灯光。

sentences.english: I'd like to take a suite with lake view. What's the rate for it?
sentences.chinese: 我要一间可以眺望湖景的套房。每天收费多少？

sentences.english: Built with wood, both in its structure and its interior.
sentences.chinese: 眺望台内部与结构运用了木材。

sentences.english: "I was confronted, as far as the eye could see, with the sight of plastic, " Moore later recalled.
sentences.chinese: “我蒙了，极目眺望，都是塑料，”摩尔后来回忆道。

sentences.english: It seemed like we could see out into forever, and the great back of the snaking Wall showed us the way.
sentences.chinese: 顺着蜿蜒的长城向远处眺望，似乎看不到尽头。

sentences.english: He will be the caretaker of the snowbound Overlook Hotel.
sentences.chinese: 他将成为冰封的“眺望旅馆”的看管员。

sentences.english: Flower-de- luce climbed all the braes one by one to overlook the visit of darkness like Psalters.
sentences.chinese: 鸢尾花渐次爬上所有的山坡，眺望黑色的诗篇降临。

sentences.english: A richly ornamented building grid building, Pinglan view.
sentences.chinese: 雕梁画栋的格子楼里，凭栏眺望。

sentences.english: You've never actually stood there and looked up at that beautiful ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 你没试过站在那儿，昂首眺望天花板上的名画吧？

sentences.english: From the mountain, Lenny can look off across the valley.
sentences.chinese: 雷尼可以从那座山眺望谷间远处的那边。

sentences.english: The two detainees are boarding hall overlooking coastline terminals.
sentences.chinese: 两位船客正在登船大厅眺望码头岸线。

sentences.english: Beautiful day in Beijing today, my view from Red Gate Gallery.
sentences.chinese: 北京晴朗的一天，红门画廊的眺望台。

sentences.english: A spacious terrace shaded by an awning overlooks an interior courtyard.
sentences.chinese: 该公寓有一座带雨篷的宽敞平台眺望着内庭。

sentences.english: In looking on the happy autumn fields.
sentences.chinese: 每当眺望这欢畅的秋野。

definition: to look into the distance
to gaze into the distance
to gaze afar/to look into the distance
to overlook/to look down from a height
as far as the eye can see
to espy/to spot
to gaze at/to stare fixedly at
to take in the whole scene at once/to have a panoramic view
to look/to raise one's eyes
to look up at/to look up to sb hopefully
to overlook/to look down at
to stand for a long time
summit
to look around/to peep (through a crack)/to peer at/to throw a look at
to raise one's head and look into the distance/fig. to forward to/to long for
observation tower/lookout tower
